roll.formula: @X ← (if #1 = "Basic" then d20 elif #1 = "Advantage" then 2d20H1 elif #1 = "Disadvantage" then 2d20L1 else 20 end). if @X = 1 then @CRITICAL((#2,@X)) else @BDMG ← (if #2 = "Shillelagh" then if @X = 20 then (2d8 + @CHA) else (d8 + @CHA) end else 0 end). @FDMG ← (if #2 = "Eldritch Blast" then if @X = 20 then (2d10 + @CHA) else (d10 + @CHA) end else 0 end). @FIDMG ← (if #2 = "Firebolt" then (if @X = 20 then #9 ← (2 x @MAGICDICE((@LVL))). else #9 ← (@MAGICDICE((@LVL))). end). #9Od10 else 0 end). @LDMG ← (if #2 = "Shocking Grasp" then (if @X = 20 then #9 ← (2 x @MAGICDICE((@LVL))). else #9 ← (@MAGICDICE((@LVL))). end). #9Bd8 else 0 end). @CBDMG ← (if #2 = "Chaos Bolt" then @D1 ← (d8). @D2 ← (d8). #9 ← (if @X = 20 then (2 x #5) else (#5) end). (if @X = 20 then (@D1 + @D2 + 2d8 + #9d6) else (@D1 + @D2 + #9d6) end) elif #2 = "Chaos Bolt(Warlock)" then @D1 ← (d8). @D2 ← (d8). #9 ← (if @X = 20 then (2 x @PACTLVL) else (@PACTLVL) end). (if @X = 20 then (@D1 + @D2 + 2d8 + #9d6) else (@D1 + @D2 + #9d6) end) else 0 end). @NDMG ← (if #2 = "Chill Touch" then (if @X = 20 then #9 ← (2 x @MAGICDICE((@LVL))). else #9 ← (@MAGICDICE((@LVL))). end). #9Kd8 else 0 end). @NDMG ← (if (#2 = "Eldritch Blast" ∨ #2 = "Shillelagh" ∨ #2 = "Firebolt" ∨ #2 = "Shocking Grasp" ∨ #2 = "Chromatic Orb" ∨ #2 = "Chaos Bolt" ∨ #2 = "Chromatic Orb(Warlock)" ∨ #2 = "Chaos Bolt(Warlock)" ∨ #2 = "Chill Touch") ∧ #3 = 1 then if @X = 20 then (2Kd6 + @NDMG) else (Kd6 + @NDMG) end else @NDMG end). (if @X = 20 then @CRITICAL((#2,@X)) else @X ← (if #4 = 0 then @X else (@X + Wd4) end). @ATKROLL((#2,@X)) end) + (if #2 = "Chaos Bolt" ∨ #2 = "Chaos Bolt(Warlock)" then (if @D1 = @D2 then "Attack Again!" + @CHAOSBOLT((@D1)) else @CHAOSBOLT((@D1)) + "or" + @CHAOSBOLT((@D2)) end) else "" end) + @ATKDMG((@BDMG,@FDMG,@FIDMG,@LDMG,@CBDMG,@NDMG)) end

"Spell Level Countered:" + (if @COUNTER < (10 + @PACTLVL) then @PACTLVL elif @COUNTER > 19 then 9 else (@COUNTER - 10) end) elif #1 = "Sickening Radiance" then "Radiant:" + 4Yd10 + "CON" + @SAVEDC(()) + "(Neg)" elif #1 = "Shadow of Moil" then "Necrotic:" + 2Kd8 elif #1 = "Vicious Mockery" ∨ #1 = "Synaptic Static" then "Psychic:" + (if #1 = "Vicious Mockery" then #9 ← (@MAGICDICE((@LVL))). #9Bd4 + "WIS" + @SAVEDC(()) + "Neg" else 8Bd6 + "INT" + @SAVEDC(()) + "Half" end) else then "Fire:" + 3Od10 + "DEX" + @SAVEDC(()) + "Half" end)
